String.Source: Summons a Mirage for <dur> seconds wherever the caster is pointing.
String.Dest: Summons a Mirage for <dur> seconds wherever the caster is pointing.

String.Source: As long as you concentrate, summons an unbreakable barrier around you.
String.Dest: As long as you concentrate, summons an unbreakable barrier around you.

String.Source: Cast on the nearby ground to raise the earth and form a protective wall that lasts for <dur> seconds.
String.Dest: Cast on the nearby ground to raise the earth and form a protective wall that lasts for <dur> seconds.

String.Source: Cast on the nearby ground to raise the earth and form a protective pillar that lasts for <dur> seconds.
String.Dest: Cast on the nearby ground to raise the earth and form a protective pillar that lasts for <dur> seconds.

String.Source: Carry weight is reduced by <mag> for <dur>.
String.Dest: Carry weight is reduced by <mag> for <dur>.

String.Source: An attack which burns the enemy for 6 seconds, dealing <mag> points of damage to Health every second.
String.Dest: An attack which burns the enemy for 6 seconds, dealing <mag> points of damage to Health every second.

String.Source: A <mag> point Shocking explosion centered on the caster. Does more damage to closer targets.
String.Dest: A <mag> point Shocking explosion centered on the caster. Does more damage to closer targets.

String.Source: Creates a concealing fog covering the caster's general area for <dur> seconds, hiding them from nearby threats.
String.Dest: Creates a concealing fog covering the caster's general area for <dur> seconds, hiding them from nearby threats.

String.Source: Creates a blinding mist embracing the caster's near vicinity.
String.Dest: Creates a blinding mist embracing the caster's near vicinity.

String.Source: Golden Lightning that does <mag> points of shock damage per second to Health and Magicka, with a chance of disintegrating opponents.
String.Dest: Golden Lightning that does <mag> points of shock damage per second to Health and Magicka, with a chance of disintegrating opponents.

String.Source: For <dur> seconds, you absorb your opponents' health within melee range, dealing <8> points of damage per second.
String.Dest: For <dur> seconds, you absorb your opponents' health within melee range, dealing <8> points of damage per second.

String.Source: Target turns into a ghost for <dur> seconds, revealing their inner spirit animal and making it vulnerable to attack.
String.Dest: Target turns into a ghost for <dur> seconds, revealing their inner spirit animal and making it vulnerable to attack.

String.Source: A seismic wave that staggers enemies in front of you, dealing <mag> points of damage.
String.Dest: A seismic wave that staggers enemies in front of you, dealing <mag> points of damage.

String.Source: A pile of thrown rocks that does <mag> points of damage and staggers your foe.
String.Dest: A pile of thrown rocks that does <mag> points of damage and staggers your foe.

String.Source: A spear of stone that does <mag> points of damage and staggers your foe.
String.Dest: A spear of stone that does <mag> points of damage and staggers your foe.

String.Source: Creates a clone of the player for <dur> seconds
String.Dest: Creates a clone of the player for <dur> seconds

String.Source: Restores 20 points of Stamina with each hit.
String.Dest: Restores 20 points of Stamina with each hit.

String.Source: Releases a fiery breath for <mag> damages
String.Dest: Releases a fiery breath for <mag> damages

String.Source: Conjuration is <mag> points stronger for <dur> seconds.
String.Dest: Conjuration is <mag> points stronger for <dur> seconds.

String.Source: Fortifies Destruction and Smithing by <mag> and Stamina by <15> points for <dur> seconds.
String.Dest: Fortifies Destruction and Smithing by <mag> and Stamina by <15> points for <dur> seconds.

String.Source: Fortfies Enchanting and Two-Handed by <mag> points and Stamina by <15> points for <dur> seconds.
String.Dest: Fortfies Enchanting and Two-Handed by <mag> points and Stamina by <15> points for <dur> seconds.

String.Source: Fortifies Illusion och Alchemy skill is <mag> points and Health by <15> for <dur> seconds.
String.Dest: Fortifies Illusion och Alchemy skill is <mag> points and Health by <15> for <dur> seconds.

String.Source: Fortifies Light Armor and Archery skills by <mag> and Stamina by <15> points for <dur> seconds.
String.Dest: Fortifies Light Armor and Archery skills by <mag> and Stamina by <15> points for <dur> seconds.

String.Source: Fortifies Lockpicking and Alteration by <mag> points and Health by <15> for <dur> seconds.
String.Dest: Fortifies Lockpicking and Alteration by <mag> points and Health by <15> for <dur> seconds.

String.Source: Marksman is <mag> points stronger for <dur> seconds.
String.Dest: Marksman is <mag> points stronger for <dur> seconds.

String.Source: Fortifies One-handed and Pickpocket by <7> points as well as Magicka by <15> points for <dur> seconds.
String.Dest: Fortifies One-handed and Pickpocket by <7> points as well as Magicka by <15> points for <dur> seconds.

String.Source: Pickpocketing is <mag> points stronger for <dur> seconds.
String.Dest: Pickpocketing is <mag> points stronger for <dur> seconds.

String.Source: Fortifies Restoration and Heavy Armor is <mag> points and Stamina by <15> points for <dur> seconds.
String.Dest: Fortifies Restoration and Heavy Armor is <mag> points and Stamina by <15> points for <dur> seconds.

String.Source: Smithing is <mag> points stronger for <dur> seconds
String.Dest: Smithing is <mag> points stronger for <dur> seconds

String.Source: Fortifies Sneak and Conjuration is <mag> points and Health <15> for <dur> seconds.
String.Dest: Fortifies Sneak and Conjuration is <mag> points and Health <15> for <dur> seconds.

String.Source: Two-handed is <mag> points stronger for <dur> seconds.
String.Dest: Two-handed is <mag> points stronger for <dur> seconds.

String.Source: Sneak is <mag> points stronger for <dur> seconds.
String.Dest: Sneak is <mag> points stronger for <dur> seconds.

String.Source: Alteration is <mag> points stronger for <dur> seconds.
String.Dest: Alteration is <mag> points stronger for <dur> seconds.

String.Source: Fortifies Block and Speech by <mag> points and Magicka by <15> points for <dur> seconds.
String.Dest: Fortifies Block and Speech by <mag> points and Magicka by <15> points for <dur> seconds.

String.Source: Wards you against any damage caused by dimensional instability.
String.Dest: Wards you against any damage caused by dimensional instability.

String.Source: Everything within <75> feet is pushed away from you. You are <100%> weaker to shock for <30> seconds.
String.Dest: Everything within <75> feet is pushed away from you. You are <100%> weaker to shock for <30> seconds.

String.Source: Heals <2> points per second for <120> seconds. Drains magicka by <1> points per second for <45> seconds.
String.Dest: Heals <2> points per second for <120> seconds. Drains magicka by <1> points per second for <45> seconds.

String.Source: Grants invisibility, consuming some lifeforce to summon a decoy for up to <60> seconds.
String.Dest: Grants invisibility, consuming some lifeforce to summon a decoy for up to <60> seconds.

String.Source: Creatures and people up to level <25> nearby won't fight for <60> seconds. Your Magicka and Stamina are depleted by <5> points per second for <30> seconds.
String.Dest: Creatures and people up to level <25> nearby won't fight for <60> seconds. Your Magicka and Stamina are depleted by <5> points per second for <30> seconds.

String.Source: As your rage blinds you, you reflect incoming damage and regenerate stamina <25>% faster.
String.Dest: As your rage blinds you, you reflect incoming damage and regenerate stamina <25>% faster.

String.Source: For <30> seconds, time slows down by <15>% and your magicka regenerates <50>% faster.
String.Dest: For <30> seconds, time slows down by <15>% and your magicka regenerates <50>% faster.

String.Source: Your breath becomes Fire, dealing <30> damage per second to enemies in front of you.
String.Dest: Your breath becomes Fire, dealing <30> damage per second to enemies in front of you.

String.Source: Your increased mass makes it harder for you to move, but reduces incoming damage by <25>% and allows you to block <20>% more damage.
String.Dest: Your increased mass makes it harder for you to move, but reduces incoming damage by <25>% and allows you to block <20>% more damage.

String.Source: Completely drains the target's Magicka, preventing it from casting spells for <dur> seconds. Dispels defensive spells and conjured creatures.
String.Dest: Completely drains the target's Magicka, preventing it from casting spells for <dur> seconds. Dispels defensive spells and conjured creatures.

String.Source: Weakens the target´s armor rating by a strength of <mag> for <dur> seconds.
String.Dest: Weakens the target´s armor rating by a strength of <mag> for <dur> seconds.

String.Source: Undead up to level <mag> are disintegrated. Other undead flee for <dur> seconds.
String.Dest: Undead up to level <mag> are disintegrated. Other undead flee for <dur> seconds.

String.Source: Reflects <67%> of received damage back to the attacker. For each received hit there's a <10%> chance of staggering and disarming the attacker.
String.Dest: Reflects <67%> of received damage back to the attacker. For each received hit there's a <10%> chance of staggering and disarming the attacker.

String.Source: damages close Dwarven targets by <mag> points.
String.Dest: damages close Dwarven targets by <mag> points.

String.Source: Causes <mag> points of poison damage on non dwarven targets for <dur> seconds.
String.Dest: Causes <mag> points of poison damage on non dwarven targets for <dur> seconds.

String.Source: For <60> seconds, opponents in melee range take <4> points of damage and their armor rating is reduced by <14> points. Automatons take an additional <14> points of damage.
String.Dest: For <60> seconds, opponents in melee range take <4> points of damage and their armor rating is reduced by <14> points. Automatons take an additional <14> points of damage.

String.Source: This really shouldn't be a spell and if you read this, something went horrible wrong.
String.Dest: This really shouldn't be a spell and if you read this, something went horrible wrong.

String.Source: For <dur> seconds, create a running illusion that provokes nearby enemies. When killed, nearby actors become frenzied.
String.Dest: For <dur> seconds, create a running illusion that provokes nearby enemies. When killed, nearby actors become frenzied.

String.Source: Summon a ghostly mount to ride for <dur> seconds.
String.Dest: Summon a ghostly mount to ride for <dur> seconds.

String.Source: opponents in melee range becomes hostile.
String.Dest: opponents in melee range becomes hostile.

String.Source: Nearby dead and undead are marked for <dur> seconds and can be seen through walls.
String.Dest: Nearby dead and undead are marked for <dur> seconds and can be seen through walls.

String.Source: A shrapnel explosion dealing <40> points of damage in a 25-foot radius. Deals splash damage to targets within the radius.
String.Dest: A shrapnel explosion dealing <40> points of damage in a 25-foot radius. Deals splash damage to targets within the radius.

String.Source: Drains dead bodies of their remaining Magicka, disintegrating them in the process.
String.Dest: Drains dead bodies of their remaining Magicka, disintegrating them in the process.

String.Source: Blocking physical attacks has a chance of summoning an ancient protector.
String.Dest: Blocking physical attacks has a chance of summoning an ancient protector.

String.Source: Cast on a nearby surface, pushes people and creatures, away sending them flying.
String.Dest: Cast on a nearby surface, pushes people and creatures, away sending them flying.

String.Source: Cast on a nearby surface, it staggers targets momentarily when stepped on.
String.Dest: Cast on a nearby surface, it staggers targets momentarily when stepped on.

String.Source: Cast on a nearby surface, creatures and people up to level <mag> won't fight for <dur> seconds.
String.Dest: Cast on a nearby surface, creatures and people up to level <mag> won't fight for <dur> seconds.

String.Source: Cast on a nearby surface, creatures and people up to level <mag> flee from combat for <dur> seconds.
String.Dest: Cast on a nearby surface, creatures and people up to level <mag> flee from combat for <dur> seconds.

String.Source: Mirrors the caster's rate of Health loss and recovery with the target's for <dur> seconds.
String.Dest: Mirrors the caster's rate of Health loss and recovery with the target's for <dur> seconds.

String.Source: Mirrors the caster's rate of Magicka loss and recovery with the target's for <dur> seconds.
String.Dest: Mirrors the caster's rate of Magicka loss and recovery with the target's for <dur> seconds.

String.Source: Mirrors the caster's rate of Stamina loss and recovery with the target's for <dur> seconds.
String.Dest: Mirrors the caster's rate of Stamina loss and recovery with the target's for <dur> seconds.

String.Source: Matches the target's rate of <Magicka> loss and recovery with caster for <dur>, does not work on undead, dragons, daedra or machines.
String.Dest: Matches the target's rate of <Magicka> loss and recovery with caster for <dur>, does not work on undead, dragons, daedra or machines.

String.Source: Matches the <Target's> rate of <Magicka> loss with caster for <dur> with nearby Allys, does not work on undead, dragons, daedra or machines.
String.Dest: Matches the <Target's> rate of <Magicka> loss with caster for <dur> with nearby Allys, does not work on undead, dragons, daedra or machines.

String.Source: The target's rate of Health loss and recovery is mirrored on its nearby allies for <dur> seconds.
String.Dest: The target's rate of Health loss and recovery is mirrored on its nearby allies for <dur> seconds.

String.Source: The target's rate of Magicka loss and recovery is mirrored on its nearby allies for <dur> seconds.
String.Dest: The target's rate of Magicka loss and recovery is mirrored on its nearby allies for <dur> seconds.

String.Source: The target's rate of Stamina loss and recovery is mirrored on its nearby allies for <dur> seconds.
String.Dest: The target's rate of Stamina loss and recovery is mirrored on its nearby allies for <dur> seconds.

String.Source: Lightning beam that does <mag> points of shock damage to Health and Magicka per second.
String.Dest: Lightning beam that does <mag> points of shock damage to Health and Magicka per second.

String.Source: A ray of fire that does <mag> points of damage per second. Targets on fire take extra damage.
String.Dest: A ray of fire that does <mag> points of damage per second. Targets on fire take extra damage.

String.Source: A stream of cold that does <mag> points of damage per second to Health and Stamina.
String.Dest: A stream of cold that does <mag> points of damage per second to Health and Stamina.

String.Source: Strikes against undead targets deal extra damage and ignore frost resistance.
String.Dest: Strikes against undead targets deal extra damage and ignore frost resistance.

String.Source: Targets take <mag> points of damage for <dur> seconds.
String.Dest: Targets take <mag> points of damage for <dur> seconds.

String.Source: Take on the form of the Werewolf for <150> seconds.
String.Dest: Take on the form of the Werewolf for <150> seconds.

String.Source: If target dies within <dur> seconds, secondary Explosion follows.
String.Dest: If target dies within <dur> seconds, secondary Explosion follows.

String.Source: A burst of steam that does <mag> points of damage per second.
String.Dest: A burst of steam that does <mag> points of damage per second.

String.Source: Sacrifices the caster's Health points by <mag> to
String.Dest: Sacrifices the caster's Health points by <mag> to

String.Source: Speech is improved by <mag>% for <dur> seconds.
String.Dest: Speech is improved by <mag>% for <dur> seconds.

String.Source: Speech is damaged by <mag>% for <dur> seconds.
String.Dest: Speech is damaged by <mag>% for <dur> seconds.

String.Source: You gain immense strength and courage for <dur> seconds.
String.Dest: You gain immense strength and courage for <dur> seconds.

String.Source: Creates a ghost clone of the player for <dur> seconds
String.Dest: Creates a ghost clone of the player for <dur> seconds

String.Source: Grants invisibility, consuming some lifeforce to summon a decoy for <60> seconds. If killed, its vengeful ghost will aid you for an additional <60> seconds.
String.Dest: Grants invisibility, consuming some lifeforce to summon a decoy for <60> seconds. If killed, its vengeful ghost will aid you for an additional <60> seconds.

String.Source: Releases a Frost breath for <mag> damages
String.Dest: Releases a Frost breath for <mag> damages

String.Source: Your breath becomes Frost, dealing <34> damage per second to enemies in front of you.
String.Dest: Your breath becomes Frost, dealing <34> damage per second to enemies in front of you.

String.Source: For <dur> seconds, your heightened vision and insight connects you to the souls of all living creatures within <area> feet. If killed, their soul fills a Soul Gem.
String.Dest: For <dur> seconds, your heightened vision and insight connects you to the souls of all living creatures within <area> feet. If killed, their soul fills a Soul Gem.
